ygData.subject: Armor and Dual wield
ygData.msgSnippet: First of all, to answer the question of a full suit of bronze.  A small suit can cost from 300p to 350p.  Also, I bought a Symbol of loyalty to Vox Bracer for
ygData.messageBody:
First of all, to answer the question of a full suit of bronze. A small suit can cost from 300p to 350p. Also, I bought a Symbol of loyalty to Vox Bracer for 20p! I found out that is twice as good as a Steel Plate one. Nonetheless, I am selling it because in a while it will probally be common. People have offered 400p and more for it! Talk about profit. I have just gotten dual wield, what should I use, I am thinking of buying two combine LS's, to replace my Dwarven 2H axe. Should I? Also, could two Tentacle whips be better than two combine LS's? Well, Can anyone tell me what 1H slashing weapons I should get, I have about 400p now. )

Dubas,
Mithaniel Marr.
